query:
INSERT INTO teacher_future_schedules (
                teacher, date,

                periods, fully_absent, comment
            )
            VALUES ($1, DATE '1/1/1970' + $2 * INTERVAL '1 day', $3, $4, $5)
                ON CONFLICT (teacher, date)
                DO UPDATE SET
                    periods = $3,
                    fully_absent = $4,
                    comment = $5;
